attributes.action: increase the winter fuel allowance for pensioners in line with increases in domestic fuel prices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The price of domestic heating fuels is continuing to rise sharply, and is causing great hardship for pensioners. As an example, the price of domestic heating oil has increased 30% in the last 5 months, and 81% in the last 16 months.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
